name: Farthest Place - LD48 Game
description:
Control a drone down an endless hole. Avoid obstacles as colliding with them decreases the drones health (This includes walls)

Note: There isn't anything new to see beyond 3000m.

Controls:

WASD / Arrow Keys: Move drone

Space: Decelerate

Tip: The drone automatically accelerates downwards. Make sure to sure the space bar so that you aren't going too fast that you can't avoid obstacles
